ygData.subject: RE: Gnomestock '99
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, the Friday after thanksgiving. some of us in the IT profession work many long hours, and many weekends and holidays ... From: Talies the Wanderer
ygData.messageBody:
yes, the Friday after thanksgiving. some of us in the IT profession work
many long hours, and many weekends and holidays

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 3:19 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gnomestock '99


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

At 01:36 PM 11/23/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>Noon on a Friday? What college student is organizing this shindig anyhow?
>I don't want to sound *too* much like the decrepid cog in the workforce
that
>I am, but some of us might have to work and stuff.


The Friday after Thanksgiving?

Gnotalies
